dict.acceptation: 给某物加玻璃；反映；使平滑如玻璃；

sent.orig: The Glass-Steagall act, which separated commercial from investment banking, should never, he says, have been repealed.
sent.trans: 他表示，将商业银行业务与投资银行业务分离的《格拉斯-斯蒂格尔法案》(Glass-SteagallAct)从来都不该被废除。

sent.orig: The construction glasses include toughened glass, sandwich glass, hollow glass, bulled-prof glass and curved glass.
sent.trans: 建筑用玻璃有钢化玻璃、层玻璃、空玻璃、弹玻璃和弯弧玻璃。

sent.orig: Tableware and Cutlery, Glass and Glassware, Glass Accessories Glass, Art Glass, Tabletop, Perfume Bottle.
sent.trans: 采购产品餐具，玻璃和玻璃器具类，玻璃配件，玻璃，艺术玻璃，桌面，香水瓶子。

sent.orig: The main products are glass candle jars, glass candle cups, glass bell glass water cups, etc.
sent.trans: 主要产品有玻璃蜡烛杯、罐，玻璃水杯，玻璃钟罩，等等。

sent.orig: We are majored in the production of glass, glass machines, glass hardware.
sent.trans: 本公司专业生产玻璃，玻璃五金，玻璃机械。还生产陶瓷类制品。
